content.question: In considering the archeological records some scholars have suggested that the Serpent Mound is related to

choices.label: burial practices among the Mississippian people
a pathway to be followed during initiation rites
the fertility of the earth and crop growth
a desire to create a physical boundary between tribal groups

content.answer: the fertility of the earth and crop growth

topic.text: 5.4: Theories and Interpretations of Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
